item.title: Export Maven Project with Dependencies
item.description: We want to export a Java-based project to an executable jar file. The process to export a jar file is not the same with a Maven Project which contains external denpendencies.

item.title: Install Docker and Create Images
item.description: Docker is a software platform that allows you to build, test, and deploy applications quickly. In this post, we are going to install Docker and create an image for the test environment.

item.title: Add a custom API in WordPress
item.description: This post presents a method to create custom API endpoints in WordPress REST API (V2). WordPress REST API The WordPress REST API provides API endpoints for WordPress data types that allow developers to interact with sites remotely by sending and receiving JSON (JavaScript Object Notation) objects. When you send content to or make a request to the API, the response will be returned in JSON. This enables developers to create, read and update WordPress content from client-side JavaScript or from external applications, even those written in languages beyond PHP.
